alert.note: Alert for Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Montague County through 645 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Terral to 8 miles southeast of Bluegrove. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowie, Nocona, St. Jo, Lake Nocona, Lake Amon G Carter, Nocona Hills, Montague, Fruitland, Capps Corner, Forestburg, Ringgold, Stoneburg, Belcherville, Mallard, Bonita, and Illinois Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Texas.
